name: Jobb Company
description:
Congratulations! Your application to work in the prestigious Jobb Corporation has been accepted! You'll be certainly working at a very stable work position: the everything-man! You'll have to water the office plants, deliver coffees, print documents and even accept or reject CV's from other people! Doesn't that sound exciting?

Keep up with the ridiculous amount of tasks that you'll receive, or else you'll lose a part of your juicy salary. The controls are simple: Move around the office with W, A S and D. Pick up objects with E, and use them or interact with different parts of the office with the Space bar.

Office hours are from 9:00 to 17:00. Don't be late. Don't hesitate to stay more time if you "want" to.

** We recommend you to download the game to enjoy a better experience. However, feel free from playing it on the web browser.
developers: Carlos Manuel Pozuelo - Pink shard games
